R

RaspberryPi - Class in communications
This class controls the creation of new VisionProcessor classes on the Raspberry Pi end of things.

removeSmallObjects(int) - Method in class communications.VisionProcessor
Removes objects with an area less than the size given, without altering the size of other blobs (does not use erosion).
RemoveSmObsWindow - Class in visionUtility
 
RemoveSmObsWindow(int) - Constructor for class visionUtility.RemoveSmObsWindow
 
requestNewThread() - Method in class communications.RaspberryPi
Requests a new thread to start, allowing the image to be processed in multiple ways.
requestSingleProcessedImage() - Method in class communications.VisionProcessor
Sends a request to process a SINGLE image ONLY if it is not continuously processing images
restartCode() - Method in class communications.RaspberryPi
Sends a request for the Raspberry Pi to restart it's code only, without the need to reboot.
run() - Method in class communications.RaspberryPi
 
run() - Method in class communications.VisionProcessor
 
run() - Method in class communications.VisionProcessorClient.Processor
This is the method everything will be run in; It is the "main method" of new threads
